document.full_text: brent crude oil futures rose nearly 1 percent to settle above $112 a barrel on friday, regaining strength around midday along with u.s. crude futures as traders covered shorts ahead of the weekend.
document.title: brent crude up on day, but ends week lower
lines_and_colors: brent crude oil futures rose nearly 1 percent to settle above $112 a barrel on friday, regaining strength around midday along with u.s. crude futures as traders covered shorts ahead of the weekend.
